Classes in com.collabnet.ccf.core.eis.connection used by com.collabnet.ccf.core.eis.connection
ConnectionException
           
ConnectionFactory
          Specifies the interface for the plugin provider to define how to obtain a connection to the system that he is connecting to.
ConnectionPool
          This class implements the Connection pooling mechanism for the connection manager.
ConnectionPool.ConnectionInfo
          This class's objects represent a connection in the pool.
MaxConnectionsReachedException
          This exception class represents the maximum allowed connection configuration for a Connection Pool is reached.

ConnectionManager
          The connection manager is responsible to manage the connection pools for each source/target system.

          This exception class represents the maximum allowed connection configuration for a Connection Pool is reached.
